S.FORM: == Ralph Beard == u siwkay niza u Amilika a tademaw, tatama. u kawaw niza u mimaliay. 12 bulad 2 demiad, 1927 a mihca, Ralph Beard, miunduay. (mapatay i 2007 a mihca)
== Ralph Beard == o siwkay niza o Amilika a tademaw, tatama. o kawaw niza o mimaliay. 12 bolad 2 demiad, 1927 a mihca, Ralph Beard, miondoay. (mapatay i 2007 a mihca)
